dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Al electrolytic capacitor; Alum electrolytic capacitor; Aluminum capacitor
Al electrolytic capacitor; Alum electrolytic capacitor; Aluminum capacitor
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitors are components widely used in electronic circuits for their high capacitance-to-volume ratio. They consist of an anode made from pure aluminum foil with an etched surface, electrolyte (which can be liquid or solid), and a cathode that commonly uses another layer of aluminum oxide. These capacitors are characterized by their cylindrical shape, polarity, and the method of electrolysis used to produce the aluminum oxide layer. They are applied across various industries for filtering, coupling, and decoupling applications, in power supply units, and audio applications. Depending on the specific design and materials, these capacitors can comply with industry standards such as IEC or EIA. The production route involves rolling, trimming, forming, and impregnation steps, often followed by assembly into a final product available to consumers or for industrial use.

铝电解电容器是广泛应用于电子电路中的组件，因其体积对电容比高而受到重视。它们由具有蚀刻表面的纯铝箔阳极，电解液（可以是液体或固体）以及通常使用另一层氧化铝的阴极组成。这些电容器以其圆柱形状、极性以及用于生产氧化铝层的电解方法为特征。它们被应用于各种行业，用于过滤、耦合和去耦应用，在电源单元和音频应用中。根据特定设计和材料的不同，这些电容器可以符合IEC或EIA等行业标准。生产路线包括滚压、修整、成型和浸渍步骤，常常随后会组装成最终产品，供消费者或工业用途使用。
